full_output.summary: Im Prasanna Kumar Dheekonda, a third-year computer science and engineering student at SRM University AP. I am an AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner with expertise on both AWS and IBM Cloud. I am proficient in C, C++, and Java and have created a portfolio website to exhibit my projects. My technical profile is defined by my knowledge in the cloud and commitment to remaining current with industry developments. For details, click here.

certifications.description: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner with demonstrated knowledge of core AWS services, cloud concepts, security, and cost management, enabling efficient cloud-based solutions and effective resource utilization.
certifications.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner

certifications.description: Certified in IBM Cloud Computing Fundamentals, with expertise in cloud concepts, IBM Cloud services, architecture, and management, enabling the deployment of scalable and secure cloud solutions.
certifications.title: IBM Cloud Computing Fundamentals

certifications.description: HackerRank SQL Intermediate certified, proficient in complex SQL queries, data manipulation, and database management, demonstrating strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
certifications.title: HackerRank SQL Intermediate certification

projects.name: Chatbot Development and Deployment Using AWS Lex, Lambda, Integration
projects.description: Developed and deployed a conversational AI chatbot using AWS Lex, Lambda, and API Gateway, integrating it with social media platforms for enhanced user engagement and automated support. Achieved a 70 percent reduction in response time and high user engagement.

projects.name: Citrus Disease Detection
projects.description: Incorporated CNN methodologies, including VGG and ResNet, to develop a system for citrus disease detection from leaf images, showcasing proficiency in deep learning techniques for agricultural applications.

projects.name: Blood Donation Management System
projects.description: Developed a database management system using Java to handle donor information, blood inventory, and donation records. Utilized Javas object-oriented programming principles to create a user-friendly interface. Ensured accurate and secure data retrieval and manipulation within the database system.

experiences.description: Spearheaded customer-centric product development initiatives at X-Site International. integrated market research, data- driven decision-making, and cross-functional collaboration. Successfully aligned products with customer expectations, achieving optimal market fit.
Proficient in AWS cloud services and infrastructure management. Hands-on experience in Amazon Lex for chatbot development. Understanding of EC2 instances for scalable computing solutions.

As the Creative Head of the E-Cell in the Entrepreneurship Department at SRM University AP, I manage design projects and web development. With a year of experience, I create visually appealing designs and ensure their quality for publication. My role requires a keen eye for aesthetics and attention to detail, consistently delivering impactful results.

full_output.name: Prasanna Kumar Dheekonda
achievements_and_awards: Winner of Webmobdevthon Hackathon for developing a website with UI/UX design for SRM University APs Hackathon club, demonstrating exceptional web development and design skills.
First Runner-Up at Prodevthon Hackathon for creating an outstanding UI, showcasing exceptional design skills and innovative user interface development.
Participated in the Meta Spark AR Hackathon and successfully submitted an AR effect, showcasing creativity and technical proficiency in augmented reality development.
Participated in Uxplore, a UI/UX-based virtual competition organized by IIT Varanasi, showcasing exceptional design skills by creating user-centric and striking digital product designs.
Participated in Designex 2.0, a UI development competition using Figma and Flutter, demonstrating advanced skills in creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces.
